attributes.review: Just like the current administration this app is non functional. I downloaded it but when I opened the app it was just a loading screen for days. Very disappointed will not recommend.
attributes.title: Non functional

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app zero stars as it doesn’t even merit one star. It took forever to install and when it finally finished installing, it displayed threats and slurs. It’s absolutely abominable and I cannot believe it’s allowed on the App Store in this state.
attributes.title: Terrible.

attributes.review: This app asks for way too much personal information and I’m not comfortable putting it out there. I’ve been hacked before and it’s not fun. This app is also very glitchy and makes my phone act up. Wish I could rate 0 stars

They first asked for my phone number what? I don’t feel comfortable already and to make it worse I see an ugly orange peel with a wrinkly face on my screen I think I need to vomit 🤮 Did people really want THAT THING to be president 2020 is really not our year☺️🖕
attributes.title: Ew what did I just see (;´༎ຶٹ༎ຶ`)

attributes.review: i wish i could support my dear president with this app, but truthfully i can’t. It was a horrible experience. It is filled with FAKE NEWS and for some reason it shows an orange. I love mr. Bunkerboy but this app is trash. It ASKED FOR MY BOOTY PICS!!!!☹️ The app was poorly made it truly was a horrible OFFENSIVE experience. I do not recommend 💔
attributes.title: BY FAR THE WORST APP !!!!

attributes.review: This made a subscription where I had to pay $30 A DAY and it wouldn’t let me turn it off unless I deleted the entire app. It took several days to download. This app is just absolutely horrendous over all. Don not recommend!
attributes.title: AWEFUL

attributes.review: Kept crashing and took 1 month to download onto my phone. Also when it did download it wiped everything off my phone and threatened to deport me to Mexico even though I’m Puerto Rican (I don’t understand why I’m a natural born citizen of the United States!). Download with caution!!
attributes.title: AWFUL!

attributes.review:
This app just asked me to play 20 questions. This app just asked me for nudes. This app just said “Saturday’s are for the boys.” This app just called be a ho. This app just said the n word. This app just punched a whole in his wall. This app just posted a sad Bart Simpson edit on his story. This apps name is Kyle. This app is 17 years old 

ARE YOU? ARE YOU? ARE YOU? ARE YOU? 🔪💣
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG BEECH

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app it hacked my entire phone, and now it’s saying i have to vote for trump and donate to his campaign in order to get my stuff back! all i was trying to do was inform myself on the ways of trump and his non-sexist, non-homophobic, non-discriminatory self! 🥰🧚🏽‍♀️🐙🤍
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD ✨🥰

attributes.review: This app has terrible writing, I wasn’t really involved in the story at all.. you would think that with such a “interesting” plot and point of view this would be a great game to play. sadly no, it does not stand up to even the terrible reviews I’ve seen.
attributes.title: Not a good ARG
